name: Card Blast
description:
This game was made for Weekly Game Jam, and the theme for Week 58 was Cards. 

Play as Chovy, a wizard who has unfortunately goaded a group of imps into attacking his keep. Smite them away by fumbling through a pack of magic cards and casting them in the correct order!

How to Play: Cycle through your cards at the bottom of the screen and cast an attack in which the color and order of the cards matches the color and order of the enemy's health. 

Controls: 

  • Q: Cycle through Card 1
  • W: Cycle through Card 2
  • E: Cycle through Card 3
  • Space: Cast your combination of cards once you have selected the cards you want
